biotools.summary: Provides tools to identify and visualize branches in a phylogenetic tree that are significantly responsive to some intervention, taking as primary inputs a phylogenetic tree (of class phylo) and a data frame (or matrix) of corresponding tip (OTU) labels and p-values.

bioschemas.name: SigTree
bioschemas.summary: Provides tools to identify and visualize branches in a phylogenetic tree that are significantly responsive to some intervention, taking as primary inputs a phylogenetic tree (of class phylo) and a data frame (or matrix) of corresponding tip (OTU) labels and p-values.
